name: Mini Miners
description:
Made for The Blackthornprod GameJam #2

Our homeworld is desperate for resources. It is up to you to recover them from various planets in our solar system 

Aim with Mouse
        
RightClick to move to new planet.
        

Click the resource button to exchange energy for resources in range.

Return home to distribute supplies

Music Credits

"Lost Frontier" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
